definition[0]: someone who has a special knowledge of a particular organization because they are part of it
example[0]: an insiderâ€™s view of the way that a Japanese company works
definition[1]: someone who works for a company or an organization and so has information about it that is not available to other people
example[1]: Company insiders have expressed their reservations about the deal.
example[2]: Some industry insiders are very critical of the government.
